indicators.notes: Regulation on automotive sealing systems and emission standards. Hutchinson produces sealing systems, vibration control components, fluid transfer systems using natural rubber, synthetic rubber, and polymers. This regulation may impact their production process and supply chain.

indicators.law_name: Federal Aviation Regulation 145.67 - Aircraft Vibration Control
indicators.notes: Regulation for aircraft vibration control systems. Hutchinson produces shock absorbers, anti-vibration components using synthetic rubber, steel, and aluminum. This regulation may affect their production process and compliance.
Directive on pharmaceutical manufacturing standards. Hutchinson does not produce pharmaceuticals. This regulation may affect their compliance and supply chain.
